articles.title: Marcos: PH to change strategy in countering Chinese aggression
articles.description: President Ferdinand "Bongbong" Marcos Jr. said the Philippines needs to change its strategy in countering Chinese aggression in the West Philippine Sea because diplomatic efforts are making "very little progress."
articles.content:
President Ferdinand "Bongbong" Marcos Jr. said the Philippines needs to change its strategy in countering Chinese aggression in the West Philippine Sea because diplomatic efforts are making "very little progress."

articles.title: Marcos: PH to change strategy in countering Chinese aggression
articles.description: President Ferdinand "Bongbong" Marcos Jr. said the Philippines needs to change its strategy in countering Chinese aggression in the West Philippine Sea because diplomatic efforts are not making enough progress.
articles.content:
President Ferdinand "Bongbong" Marcos Jr. said the Philippines needs to change its strategy in countering Chinese aggression in the West Philippine Sea because diplomatic efforts are not making enough progress.

articles.title: Vatican approves blessings for same-sex couples in landmark ruling
articles.description: VATICAN CITY — The Vatican said on Monday in a landmark ruling approved by Pope Francis that Roman Catholic priests can administer blessings The Vatican said on Monday in a landmark ruling approved by Pope Francis that Roman Catholic priests can administer blessings to same-sex couples as long as they are not part of regular Church rituals or liturgies.
articles.content:
VATICAN CITY — The Vatican said on Monday in a landmark ruling approved by Pope Francis that Roman Catholic priests can administer blessings to same-sex couples as long as they are not part of regular Church rituals or liturgies.
